messages.subject: DOMO
messages.msgSnippet: I just wanted to thank everyone for being there for me when I needed information or just for someone to chat with. Everyone thats a member on this group (I
messages.messageBody:
I just wanted to thank everyone for being there for me when I needed
information or just for someone to chat with. Everyone thats a member
on this group (I like to call it my clan) are loyal to each other just
like the orignal Shinsengumi were and in that way threw you guys I
have a lot of love for my clan. I'm glad everyone liked my tattoo as
much as I do. I couldn't and maybe wouldn't have done it with out you
guys. Like I said I just wanted to take time out and thank you all for
your wisdom and help in the Shinsengumi world. May thier names never
be forgottan and may thier spirts live on. DOMO SHINSENGUMIhq
DOMO...
